firstNightReminder: Agnes Baker learns a not-in-play character.
otherNightReminder: If Agnes Baker died tonight, they gain the ability of the character they learnt.
name: Agnes Baker
ability: You start knowing a not-in-play character. If you die at night, you gain that character's ability for as long as you remain dead.
flavor: She took a deep breath. Agnes began to draw a stronger chalk circle with a steady hand. If this evil was coming to Arkham, it was an evil she had fought before, a long time ago. She needed to be ready for it again.

firstNightReminder: Ursula Downs learns the parity of other Townsfolk.
name: Ursula Downs
ability: You start knowing if more Townsfolk are odd or even steps from you clockwise, or that it is equal.

firstNightReminder: Silas March learns 2 players. Mark those players with "Known" reminder tokens. If both players are the same alignment, mark Silas March with the "Once" reminder token.
otherNightReminder: If both players with "Known" reminder tokens are dead, Silas March learns 2 players. Mark those players with "Known" reminder tokens. If both players are the same alignment, mark Silas March with the "Once" reminder token.
name: Silas March
ability: You start knowing 2 players of different character types. Each night*, if both are dead: you learn a new pair. You learn players of different alignments at most once per game. [+0 to +1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: Agatha Crane learns how many times they have been chosen this night.
otherNightReminder: Agatha Crane learns how many times they have been chosen this night.
name: Agatha Crane
ability: Each night, you learn how many players chose you with their abilities this night.

firstNightReminder: Father Mateo chooses a player and learns between a thumbs down to a thumbs up.
otherNightReminder: Father Mateo chooses a player and learns between a thumbs down to a thumbs up.
name: Father Mateo
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn how helpful they are being to their team.

firstNightReminder: Montery Jacks learns a player, mark that player with the Hanif reminder token. Then, Jack chooses a player and learns their alignment.
otherNightReminder: If the player with the Hanif reminder token is alive, Jack chooses a player and learns their alignment.
name: Monterey Jack
ability: You start knowing a player. Each night, as long as they are alive, choose a player (not yourself): you learn their alignment. If the player you originally learnt is evil, you receive false info.

otherNightReminder: Wilson Richards chooses a player. Mark that player with the "Protected" reminder token. After killing roles act, Wilson Richards wakes again and learns a character.
name: Wilson Richards
ability: Each night*, choose another player. If they would die tonight, you learn one of the characters that tried to kill them instead. If not, you learn false info.

otherNightReminder: Lily Chen may choose a character. If that character is in play, mark that player with the "Safe" reminder token. If not, mark Lily Chen with the "Drunk" reminder token for the rest of the game.
name: Lily Chen
ability: Each night*, you may choose a character (not your own): they are safe from evils tonight. If not in play, you are drunk.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon killed Michael McGled this night, an alive opposing player dies.
name: Michael McGlen
ability: If the Demon kills you, an alive opposing player dies.

name: Valentino Rivas
ability: Each night, choose a living player that you haven't chosen before: the Demon learns who you choose and their character.

jinxes.reason: If the Summoner is in play, they learn information given by Valenino Rivas until a Demon is made.
If Seth Bishop is in play, they learn information given by Valenino Rivas until a Demon is made.

name: Brown Jenkin
ability: You think you are a Townsfolk, and you have that ability. Information you receive is false. You might register falsely, even if dead.

otherNightReminder: If Harold Walsted died today or tonight, place the "Townsfolk are drunk" reminder token in the centre of the Grimoire.
name: Harold Walsted
ability: When you die, all Townsfolk are drunk until dusk the next day.

firstNightReminder: Show Seth Bishop 3 not-in-play characters as bluffs.
otherNightReminder: If it is night 3, wake Seth Bishop. They choose a player and a Demon.
name: Seth Bishop
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On your third night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

firstNightReminder: Padma Amrita learns which players are Outsiders.
name: Padma Amrita
ability: You start knowing which players are Outsiders. The last alive Outsider turns evil. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: If there is at least one player with a "Haunted" reminder token, one of them dies and loses their "Haunted" reminder token, even if Keziah Mason is dead.
name: Keziah Mason
ability: If you die by execution, all players who voted for your execution are haunted. Each night, a haunted player dies.

name: Jeremiah Pierce
ability: Your neighbours might register falsely to good abilities.

otherNightReminder: The Spectral Watcher chooses a player.
name: The Spectral Watcher
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die while at least 5 players live, choose a player to become evil & The Spectral Watcher instead of to kill tonight. [-1 Minion]

jinxes.reason: If the Summoner creates The Spectral Watcher, The Spectral Watcher does not change the alignment of the person they choose after being executed.
If Seth Bishop creates The Spectral Watcher, The Spectral Watcher does not change the alignment of the person they choose after being executed.

otherNightReminder: Yig chooses a player and if that player should turn evil.
name: Yig
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Once per game, you may choose to turn the player you kill evil.
